text: @chuckwoolery I don’t trust the numbers at all. The data is just too corrupted. I believe COVID-19 is real but  I also believe the world is pancaking when it shouldn’t be.  I live my life normally and practice good hygiene.  Pray about everything and don’t worry about anything.
